3673922083.name: Adagio
3673922083.description:
Duration of 7 seconds. 
•	Hand Cannon: 30% Damage, -15% RoF
•	Auto Rifle: 30% Damage, -20% RoF
•	Bow: 20% Damage, -20% Charge Rate
•	Sidearm: 30% Damage, ?% RoF
•	Shotgun: 30% Damage, -20% RoF
•	Fusion Rifle: 27% Damage, -15% Charge Rate
•	Sniper Rifle: 30% Damage, ?% RoF
•	Grenade Launcher: 30% Damage, -20% RoF
• 	Linear Fusion Rifle: 30% Damage, -15% Charge Rate

1048183818.name: Adaptive Munitions
1048183818.description: When hitting a Non-Matching Shield, damage ramps up until hitting an unshielded enemy. Stacks up to 137%, 333%, 500%.

11612903.name: Adrenaline Junkie
11612903.description:
Duration refreshed on Weapon or Grenade Kill. Any stack grants ~20 Handling. Has a duration of 4.5 seconds.
•  1x:	6.6%
•  2x:	13.2%
•  3x:	20%
•  4x:	26.6%
•  5x:	33.3%

2010801679.name: Ambitious Assassin
2010801679.description: 10% Increased Magazine Capacity per kill. Always rounds up and caps at 50%.

201365942.name: Archer's Tempo
201365942.description: Decreases Draw Time by 30% for 3 seconds. Perfect Draws are not accurate with the Draw Time stat. You can be up to 40ms too early and still achieve them.

1968497646.name: Armor-Piercing Rounds
1968497646.description: 5% Damage Increase against Combatant Shields. Bullets are able to penetrate enemies once.

354401740.name: Assassin's Blade
354401740.description: 15% Damage Increase and sets Forward Movement Speed to 9m/s (max Sprint Speed). Increases Sword Lunge distance and does not expire on stow.

1600092898.name: Backup Plan
1600092898.description: Has a 4 second duration. Multiplies Charge Time by 0.7, reduces Damage by 20%, and grants 100 Handling.

454085387.name: Blunt Execution Rounds
454085387.description: Must deal Melee damage while an enemy is within 15m. Grants 100 Handling and 500% (PvE)/100% (PvP) Damage for 10s or until firing. 4s cooldown and can be procced when stowed. Powered Melees that require sprinting, sliding, or performing a slam will not activate this perk.

2551157718.name: Box Breathing
2551157718.description:
Activates after 1.5s of being scoped-in.
• 	Scout Rifle: 66%
• 	Linear Fusion: 33%
• 	Aggressive Sniper: 37%
• 	Rapid-Fire/Adaptive Sniper: 31%

1264398905.name: Celerity
1264398905.description:
Adds the following when Last Guardian Standing:
• 	100 Handling
• 	100 Reload
• 	100 Aim Assist
• 	Massively decreased flinch received
• 	Increased accuracy
• 	Stronger target highlighting through scope
• 	Enables radar while aiming down sights

2396489472.name: Chain Reaction
2396489472.description: Kills create an elemental explosion. Not affected by Dragonfly Spec.

2978966579.name: Chill Clip
2978966579.description: Direct Hits create an explosion which applies 50 Slow to enemies.

2284787283.name: Clown Cartridge
2284787283.description: Randomly increases magazine between 10% and 50% on reload. Always rounds magazine up.

1275731761.name: Cluster Bomb
1275731761.description: Releases 8 Cluster Bombs where each one does 3% of the Explosive Damage, increasing the effective damage radius and overall damage. Each Cluster Bomb can deal up to the equivalent of a single Hand Cannon shot.

3650930298.name: Cold Steel
3650930298.description: Powered Sword Hits apply Slow Stacks. Light Attacks apply 40 Slow Stacks and Heavy Attacks apply 60 Slow Stacks.

671806388.name: Compulsive Reloader
671806388.description: While above 70% Magazine, this weapon is granted 50 Reload Speed.

1799762209.name: Cornered
1799762209.description: Activates within ~15m of 2 enemies. Grants 100ms faster Charge Time/Draw Time. Lingers for 1.5s.

3016987351.name: Counterattack
3016987351.description: Attack must be guarded within ~0.5s of starting Block. 50% damage increase for 2 seconds.

960810156.name: Danger Zone
960810156.description: Activates within ~15 meters of 3 enemies, lingers for ~4s. Sets Blast Radius to 100 and Self Damage to 40% (normally 25%).

3523296417.name: Demolitionist
3523296417.description: Primary and Power weapon kills grant 10% of your grenade energy. Specials grant 20%. 3 second cooldown on the reload effect.

3047969693.name: Desperado
3047969693.description: Reloading within 6s of a precision kill increases your Rate of Fire to 600RPM for 7 seconds. Reduces damage by 20% against combatants. Can be refreshed.

1683379515.name: Disruption Break
1683379515.description: On Elemental/Barrier or Guardian shield break: Applies a debuff that grants 50% increased Kinetic damage for 5.5s. Stacks with other debuffs due to being a weapon perk.

2848615171.name: Dragonfly
2848615171.description: Creates an elemental explosion based on the weapon's element damage, has a 3m radius. Explosion damage is dependant on weapon archetype.

1359896290.name: Dynamic Sway Reduction
1359896290.description: Greatly increases Accuracy after sustained fire for 0.6s, almost negating the effects of bloom. Adds 9 Stability over time. In-air accuracy is improved but not greatly unless used alongside Icarus Grip.

3511092054.name: Elemental Capacitor
3511092054.description: 5% ADS movement speed penalty reduction for Stasis.

1195158366.name: Encore
1195158366.description: On precision kills, grants 10 Range per stack and maxes at 3 stacks. On non-precision kill, removes a stack then grants Accuracy Cone growth and 30 Stability. Lasts 7 seconds and is refreshed on kill.

2030760728.name: Energy Transfer
2030760728.description: Grants Class Ability Energy based on the amount of damage taken. It's possible to fully charge your Class Ability with less than half of your entire Guard Energy.

2621346526.name: Ensemble
2621346526.description: Must be within 15m of 1 or more allies. Grants 30 Handling and 40 Reload Speed. Lingers for 1.5s.

3365897133.name: Explosive Head
3365897133.description:
Detonates after 0.6s. Splits 50% of damage into explosive damage with 30% more damage and no fall off.
•	In PvE, 11% increase to precision damage and 15% to non-precision damage.
• 	In PvP, total damage remains almost the same.

3194351027.name: Explosive Light
3194351027.description: Caps at 6 stacks. Heavy Grenade Launchers receives a 44% damage increase and sets Blast Radius to 55. Rocket Launchers receive a 25% damage increase and sets Blast Radius to 100.

3038247973.name: Explosive Payload
3038247973.description:
Splits 50% of damage into explosive damage with 30% more damage and no fall off.
•	In PvE, 11% increase to precision damage and 15% to non-precision damage.
• 	In PvP, total damage remains almost the same.

699525795.name: Eye of the Storm
699525795.description: Effect increases linearly as Health decreases, max benfits at Critical Health. Grants 30 Handling, -40% Accuracy Cone Size, -17% Accuracy Cone Growth.

2779035018.name: Feeding Frenzy
2779035018.description:
Duration of 3.5s. Grants a flat Reload Speed bonus and a multiplier per stack:
•	1x:	10/0x
•	2x:	45/0.9x
•	3x:	55/0.88x
•	4x:	75/0.85x
•	5x:	100/0.8x

2869569095.name: Field Prep
2869569095.description: Adds 45 Reload with 0.8x multiplier and 0.8x ready/stow animation duration. The Inventory Size increase is the reserves boost.

3824105627.name: Firefly
3824105627.description: Precision kills grant a 45 Reload Speed bonus for 6 seconds. Same radius as Dragonfly (3m), but deals 25% more damage. Does not work with Dragonfly Spec.

280464955.name: Firmly Planted
280464955.description:
Grants the following when crouched:
•	30 Handling
•	20 Stability
•	-40 Accuracy Cone Size
•	-17% Accuracy Cone Growth
•	-80 Recoil Yaw (Horizontal Recoil)

2244851822.name: Flash Counter
2244851822.description: Activates after blocking a melee within ~0.5s of starting a Block. Suppresses and Weakens the enemy, granting 20% increased Damage for 4s.

1354429876.name: Fourth Times The Charm
1354429876.description: 4 Precision Hits within 2.5s generate 2 bullets to the magazine.

4104185692.name: Frenzy
4104185692.description:
Can active when stowed and applies to all weapons with Frenzy. Grants the following after being In Combat (dealt or received damage within 5s) for 12s:
•	15% Damage Increase
•	50 Handling
•	50 Reload Speed

2117683199.name: Full Auto Trigger System
2117683199.description: Increases fire rate by 10% on shotguns only.

2888557110.name: Full Court
2888557110.description: Increases Explosive Damage by 0.63% for every metre past 10 metres, up to 25% at 50 metres.

3096702027.name: Genesis
3096702027.description: Refreshes magazine on elemental or Barrier Champion shield break. Energy weapons generate 1 ammo per hit against matching elemental shields.

2610012052.name: Golden Tricorn
2610012052.description: 15% Increased Damage for 5s, can be refreshed with a Weapon Kill. Grenade/Powered Melee Kills raise this to 50% for 10s, can be refreshed by getting another Matching Ability Kill.

1631667848.name: Grave Robber
1631667848.description: Primary weapons get refilled (generates ammo from nothing). Special and Power weapons get refreshed (reloaded with no animation, does not trigger on-reload perks).

438098033.name: Harmony
438098033.description: Activates on weapon ready within 3 seconds of getting a kill with a different weapon. Grants 20% damage increase and 15 Handling for 7 seconds.

460017080.name: Headseeker
460017080.description: Headshots mid burst after hitting at least one bodyshot receive 8% increased precision damage.

124408337.name: Headstone
124408337.description: Minor enemies spawn a medium-sized Stasis Crystal. Anything else is a large-sized Crystal. Having 5 crystals active simultaneously incurs a 5s cooldown penalty.

1570042021.name: Heating Up
1570042021.description:
Lasts 5.5s.
•  1x:
	• 15% Accuracy Cone Growth
	• 15 Stability
	• ~20 Recoil Direction 
•  2x:
	• 30% Accuracy Cone Growth
	• 30 Stability
	• ~40 Recoil Direction

1561002382.name: High-Caliber Rounds
1561002382.description: Varies between archetypes, between 6% to 11%. Allows Primary Weapons to affect higher ranked enemies and consistently stunlocks Minors.

2213355989.name: High-Impact Reserves
2213355989.description:
Gradual damage increase starting at 50% of magazine left.
• 	In PvE, 12.1% to 25.6%.
• 	In PvP, 3% to 6%.

1866048759.name: Hip-fire Grip
1866048759.description:
•	1.2x Aim Assist and Reticle Stickiness falloff distance
•	15 Aim Assistance
•	+2.7deg precision angle threshold (except for Snipers)
•	~30% Accuracy Cone Size 
•	~30 Stability

951095735.name: Impulse Amplifier
951095735.description: 13% faster projectile velocity and 10 Reload Speed with 0.8x multiplier.

1754714824.name: Kickstart
1754714824.description: 20% more damage and 100ms faster charge time during a slide after sprinting for 1.5s. Buff can expire mid-burst if you don't immediately start charging.

1015611457.name: Kill Clip
1015611457.description: Must reload within 3.8s of a Weapon Kill. 33% Damage Increase for 5s, cannot be refreshed. Hunter Marksman's Dodge and Dragon's Shadow (Wraithmetal Mail) can activate this perk.

2450788523.name: Killing Wind
2450788523.description:
Lasts for 6s, additional kills add 6s, caps at 8s.
•	20 Range
•	50 Mobility
•	40 Handling
•	30% reduced ADS movement penalty
•	1.05x Damage Falloff Distance Multiplier

3927722942.name: Lasting Impression
3927722942.description: Rockets detonate 3 seconds after impact and deal an additional 25% Explosive Damage. Effectively 20% increased damage.

1556840489.name: Lead From Gold
1556840489.description: Grants the equivalent of 1 Special Ammo Pickup.

588594999.name: Moving Target
588594999.description: 3% Reduced Movement Speed Penalty from ADS and Strafing. Passively grants at 10 Aim Assist at all times.

3513791699.name: Mulligan
3513791699.description: 20% chance on miss to return 1 Ammo to the Magazine.

2458213969.name: Multikill Clip
2458213969.description: Must reload within 3.8s of a Weapon Kill. Grants Damage Increases at 17%, 33%, and 50%. Buff is overwritten every time you refresh it.

2866798147.name: No Distractions
2866798147.description: After being scoped for 1s without firing, flinch is reduced by 35%. Stacks multiplicatively with Unflinching Armor mods.

4049631843.name: One For All
4049631843.description: 35% bonus after hitting 3 separate targets within 3 seconds of eachother. 10s duration.

2679249093.name: One-Two Punch
2679249093.description:
Lasts for 1.5s:
•	200% Melee Damage Increase normally
•	350% Melee Damage Increase against Bosses and Vehicles
•	80% Melee Damage Increase if combined with Liar's Handshake (Hunter Exotic Gauntlets)

47981717.name: Opening Shot
47981717.description:
Applies to the first bullet only after not firing for 3.1s. Grants the following:
•	20 Aim Assistance
•	20 Range
•	5% Damage Falloff Distance Increase (excluding Shotguns)
•	-5% Accuracy Cone
•	-10% Accuracy Cone Growth

1168162263.name: Outlaw
1168162263.description: Adds 63 Reload with a 0.9x multiplier for 6s.

1528281896.name: Outlaw
1528281896.description: Adds 63 Reload with a 0.9x multiplier for 6s.

1428297954.name: Perpetual Motion
1428297954.description:
Grants 1 Stack after 2s of moving, second Stack after 10s. Works while weapon is stowed. 
•  1x:	5 Stability, 10 Handling, 10 Reload
•  2x:	10 Stability, 20 Handling, 20 Reload

830282363.name: Phase Mag
830282363.description: Sets a Lightweight Frame SMG's Damage and Magazine Profile to that of a Precision Frame.

972757866.name: Pulse Monitor
972757866.description: Actiavtes when under 38 Shields. Even when stowed: reloads this weapon, grants 45 Handling, 5% Faster Swap Speed.

706527188.name: Quickdraw
706527188.description: Grants 100 Ready/Stow Handling for 1 second, or until ADS.

3425386926.name: Rampage
3425386926.description:
Has a duration of 3.5 seconds, all stacks disappear once timer expires.
•  1x:	10%
•  2x:	21%
•  3x:	33.1%

2846385770.name: Rangefinder
2846385770.description: 10% increase to Zoom and 30% increase to Aim Assist Damage Falloff Distance while ADS. 5% Faster Projectile Speed when ADS.

1523832109.name: Reconstruction
1523832109.description: After not shooting for 4s, reloads 10% of the magazine. Maxes out double magazine size.

3201496230.name: Redirection
3201496230.description: On low-tier Minor hit, grants one stack. Caps at 20 stacks.

1749209109.name: Relentless Strikes
1749209109.description: Powered Swords gain 1 Ammo after 3 Hits within ~2s of each.

1140096971.name: Seraph Rounds
1140096971.description: Combines the Penetration from Armor-Piercing Rounds, the Ricochet aspect of Ricochet Rounds, and the Flinch increase from High-Caliber Rounds. Also increases Damage Falloff by 10%, identical to the old Ricochet Rounds.

3275789089.name: Shield Disorient
3275789089.description: Explosion disorients enemies within 7 meters for 5s.

3700496672.name: Shoot To Loot
3700496672.description: 4 second cooldown. Triggers ammo-pickup effects such as Overflow.

3161816588.name: Slideshot
3161816588.description: Lasts ~3s, 0.3s cooldown. Refreshes 15% of the magazine and grants 20 Range & 30 Stability.

2039302152.name: Slideways
2039302152.description: Lasts 3s. Refreshes 15% of the magazine and grants ~20 Stability & ~25 Handling.

957782887.name: Snapshot Sights
957782887.description: Massive ADS Animation Speed multiplier bonus. Stacks with Targeting mods and Threat Detector.

908147344.name: Sneak Bow
908147344.description: Prevents Radar Ping after shooting while crouched. Provides a Scalar Reload Boost and increases hold time by 25%.

3301904089.name: Spike Grenades
3301904089.description: 50% damage increase to impact damage. If you get this perk, aim for low Blast Radius and high Velocity.

1583705720.name: Stats For All
1583705720.description:
After damaging 3 enemies within 3s of each. Duration of 10s.
•	? Range
•	? Stability
•	30 Handling
•	30 Reload Speed

1820235745.name: Subsistence
1820235745.description: Reloads 10-17% of the magazine per kill. Varies per weapon archetype.

2652708987.name: Successful Warm-Up
2652708987.description: Kills increase Charge Rate/Draw Speed by 37.5%.

3436462433.name: Surplus
3436462433.description:
Multi-charge abilities contribute to the requirements (ex. 2 grenades and a melee will count as max benefit Surplus). This perk does not let you exceed 100 Handling. 

Reload Speed: 	5/22/50 
Handling: 		10/25/50 
Stability: 		5/15/25

3350417888.name: Sympathetic Arsenal
3350417888.description: Refreshes stowed weapons after reloading up to 6s after a kill.

1890422124.name: Tap The Trigger
1890422124.description:
For controller only, weapons fire the instant trigger pressure is applied. Grants the following benefits for 0.6s:
•  Normal Benefits
	• 40 Stability
	• -50% Max Recoil Kick
	• -10% Accuracy Cone Size
•  Fusion Rifles
	•  10 Stability
	•  -12.5% Max Recoil Kick
	•  -2.5% Accuracy Cone Size

4071163871.name: Threat Detector
4071163871.description:
• Within 15m of 1 enemy:
	• ~15 Stability
	• 15 Reload
	• 0.75x Handling Animation Duration
• Within 15m of 2+ enemies:
	• ~40 Stability
	•55 Reload
	• 0.56x Handling Animation Duration

2726471870.name: Thresh
2726471870.description: Primary/Power weapon kills grant an additional 1% Super energy. Special weapon kills grant an additional 1.5% Super energy. All are 1% in PvP.

1954620775.name: Timed Payload
1954620775.description:
Detonates after 0.6s. Splits 55% of damage into explosive damage with 30% more damage and no fall off. Detonates after 0.6s.
• 	In PvE, 12% increase to precision damage and 16% to non-precision damage.
• 	In PvP, total damage remains almost the same.

2590710093.name: Tireless Blade
2590710093.description: Powered Swords gain 1 Ammo after every other kill. The first kill will also proc this.

2360754333.name: Trench Barrel
2360754333.description:
Grants the following for 5s or until 3 shots are expended:
•	50% Damage Increase
•	30 Handling
•	(?) Reload Speed

2946784966.name: Tunnel Vision
2946784966.description:
Activates after reloading 6s after a kill. Grants the following for 5s:
•	20 Aim Assist
•	-20% Accuracy Cone Size
•	ADS Handling Multiplier

1645158859.name: Under Pressure
1645158859.description: Activates once the magazine goes below 50%. Grants 25% to 50% increased accuracy and up to 30 Stability.

205890336.name: Underdog
205890336.description: Once below ~150 HP, increased Reload Speed. Effect increases linearly as health decreases up to 100 Reload with 0.9x duration multiplier.

3108830275.name: Unrelenting
3108830275.description: Starts health regen and grants ~80 HP after obtaining 3 points. Rank-And-File grant 1 point, Guardians grant 2, Elites/Mini-Bosses/Bosses grant 3. Kills must be within ~8s of eachother.

2224838837.name: Unstoppable Force
2224838837.description: 30% increased projectile damage for 4s or until blocking has stopped. Hits refresh duration.

1546637391.name: Vorpal Weapon
1546637391.description:
•	20% (40-50% in PvP) for Primary Weapons
•	15% (10-20% in PvP) for Special Weapons
•	10% for Power Weapons

3592538738.name: Wellspring
3592538738.description: Grants 7.5% ability energy split equally across all uncharged abilities. Bugged with multi-charge abilities (ex. Stasis Hunter Shuriken).

3913600130.name: Whirlwind Blade
3913600130.description: Stacks up to 10x. 3% per Caps at 30% with 10x.

2387244414.name: Zen Moment
2387244414.description: Reduces the Maximum Recoil Angle, removes Reticle Bounce, reduces Weapon Shake. Much more noticeable on controller.

2988596335.name: Alacrity
2988596335.description: Trials of Osiris Trait. Grants 20 Reload, 20 Stability, 10 Aim Assist, and 10 Range.

1607056502.name: Häkke Breach Armaments
1607056502.description: Häkke Foundry Trait. 15% increased damage against Vehicles, Turrets, Barricades, and Stasis Crystals.

1536798515.name: Land Tank
1536798515.description: Season of the Risen Trait. Kills grant 10 Resilience and 5% Damage Resist against Combatants. Stacks up to 3 times, 5s duration.

2839173408.name: Omolon Fluid Dynamics
2839173408.description: Omolon Foundry Trait. Starts at 20 Stability and 30 Reload Speed, gradually decreases unto 50% Magazine.

4091460919.name: One Quiet Moment
4091460919.description: Crucible Trait. Grants 40 Reload Speed when out of combat.

3363267119.name: Souldrinker
3363267119.description: Vow of the Disciple Trait. Health regeneration effect can be stowed for later by swapping to another weapon.

4008116374.name: SUROS Synergy
4008116374.description: SUROS Foundry Trait. Grants 36 Handling and 20% Flinch Resistance for 6s.

744217850.name: Vanguard's Vindication
744217850.description: Vanguard Trait. Regain 7 Health on kills.

79448657.name: Psychohack
79448657.description: Savathün's Throne World Trait. Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 3s.

82180537.name: Psychohack
82180537.description: Savathün's Throne World Trait. Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 3s.

357495645.name: Psychohack
357495645.description: Savathün's Throne World Trait. Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 3s.

567997816.name: Psychohack
567997816.description: Savathün's Throne World Trait. Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 3s.

883366072.name: Psychohack
883366072.description: Savathün's Throne World Trait. Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 3s.

1471995745.name: Psychohack
1471995745.description: Savathün's Throne World Trait. Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 3s.

1598147670.name: Psychohack
1598147670.description: Savathün's Throne World Trait. Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 3s.

2171055345.name: Psychohack
2171055345.description: Savathün's Throne World Trait. Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 3s.

3717985200.name: Psychohack
3717985200.description: Savathün's Throne World Trait. Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 3s.

3754350707.name: Psychohack
3754350707.description: Savathün's Throne World Trait. Sustained damage from this weapon lowers the target's damage output by 10% for 3s.

1837151577.name: Dragonfly Spec
1837151577.description: Explosion radius increased by 50%. Increases damage up to 50% from the epicentre of the explosion.

1471333428.name: Surrounded Spec
1471333428.description: Increases the perk's damage bonus to 40%. Swords increase to 35%. Bonus lingers for 1.5s after leaving Surrounded range.

4091000557.name: Minor Spec
4091000557.description: 7.8% damage increase to Minor (Square Badge) combatants.

984527513.name: Major Spec
984527513.description: 7.8% damage increase to Major (Shield and Downward Triangle Badge) combatants. This includes Champions and Minibosses.

2788909693.name: Boss Spec
2788909693.description: 7.8% damage increase to Boss (Diamond Badge) combatants.

1513326571.name: Taken Spec
1513326571.description: 10% damage increase to all Taken combatants, including Riven and Techeuns (Sedia, Kalli, & Shuro-Chi)
